headline: Figma IPO closes up over 250% in market debut
summary: Investing.com -- Today’s IPO for design software company Figma (NYSE:FIG) was a screaming success. Shares opened for trading on the New York Stock Exchange this afternoon at $85 per share, sharply above the $33 per share pricing, then continued higher.
